languages.text: {n}Грудь существа остается недвижима, а глаза плотно закрыты. И все же на секунду мускулы на искаженном лице вздрагивает при вашем приближении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Грудь существа остается недвижима, а глаза плотно закрыты. И все же на секунду мускулы на искаженном лице вздрагивает при вашем приближении.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Грудь существа остается недвижима, а глаза плотно закрыты. И все же на секунду мускулы на искаженном лице вздрагивает при вашем приближении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch briefly when you approach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}その生き物の胸は微動だにせず、目はきつく閉じられている。しかしこちらが接近すると、歪んだ顔の筋肉がピクピクと細かく痙攣した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その生き物の胸は微動だにせず、目はきつく閉じられている。しかしこちらが接近すると、歪んだ顔の筋肉がピクピクと細かく痙攣した。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}El pecho de la criatura permanece inmóvil y sus ojos están firmemente cerrados, pero los músculos de su deforme rostro se mueven cuando te acercas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El pecho de la criatura permanece inmóvil y sus ojos están firmemente cerrados, pero los músculos de su deforme rostro se mueven cuando te acercas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}它双眼紧闭，胸膛早已失去起伏。然而，当你靠近时，那张怪脸的肌肉突然剧烈抽搐起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}它双眼紧闭，胸膛早已失去起伏。然而，当你靠近时，那张怪脸的肌肉突然剧烈抽搐起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}La poitrine de la créature est immobile et ses yeux restent clos. Cependant, les muscles du visage déformé semblent se contracter légèrement à votre approche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La poitrine de la créature est immobile et ses yeux restent clos. Cependant, les muscles du visage déformé semblent se contracter légèrement à votre approche.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Die Brust der Kreatur bleibt reglos, ihre Augen bleiben fest verschlossen. Und doch zucken die Muskeln des entstellten Gesichts leicht, als du dich näherst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brust der Kreatur bleibt reglos, ihre Augen bleiben fest verschlossen. Und doch zucken die Muskeln des entstellten Gesichts leicht, als du dich näherst.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın göğsü hareketsiz, gözleriyle sımsıkı kapalı. Yine de sen yaklaşınca çarpık yüzünün kasları hızlıca seğiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's chest remains motionless and its eyes stay tightly closed. And yet the muscles on the distorted face twitch ever so briskly when you approach.{/n}
